mapper.select: SELECT PRECCP_SEQ , CUST_NAME , CUST_IC , CUST_MOBILENO , CUST_EMAIL , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD') CRT_DT , CASE WHEN CHS_STATUS = 'GREEN' THEN CHS_STATUS WHEN CHS_STATUS = 'YELLOW' THEN CHS_STATUS || '_' || CHS_RSN ELSE '-' END CHS_STATUS , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD') CRT_DT FROM SAL0343D
